question: To make education system in India more transparent, this ministry introduce e-SANAD portal and NAD recently.
option3: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation: The Ministry of Human Resource Development (HRD) launched integration of e-SANAD portal and NAD - National Academic Depository in a bid to make education system in India more transparent. e-Sanad is a project aimed at online submission and verification of documents with the ultimate object to extend contactless, cashless, faceless and paperless document attestation service. NAD is a 24X7 online storehouse of all academic awards viz. diplomas certificates, degrees, mark-sheets etc.
